aimtraining.Description: 3 mana. reduce heavy attacks to 24h cooldown. doesn't stack.

localligmaoutbreak.Description: 2 mana. deal the current ligma damage to everyone in your area (including yourself).

adventuringgear.Description: 2 mana. increase your loot score by 1 for the rest of the game.

goodiebag.Description: 1 mana. add a random ready item to your inventory.

crookedabacus.Description: 2 mana. whenever you exchange or trade, gain a seed coin for the rest of the game.

drinkingmedal.Description: 2 mana. increase the damage of your light attack by 420 for the rest of the game.

tractor.Description: 2 mana. whenever you farm, gain an additional seed coin for the rest of the game.

lichitem.Description: 2 mana. when you would die, set your hp to 4200 instead.

critterihardlyknowher.Description: 2 mana. increase your crit rolls by 1 for the rest of the game.
